greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 0, after which, a(2n) = 1 + 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = 2 * a(A269380(n)).
comment: Note the indexing: Domain starts from 1, range from 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Differs from A156552, A252754 and A246677(n-1) for the first time at n=19, which here a(19)=12, instead of 128.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 01 2016
